message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I appreciate your offer, I'm unable to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. This price still provides a good deal for you, considering the value you place on the product. What do you say?
